header.title: Instant Messenger + User status MOD
header.description: The Instant Messenger (based on php and jQuery) looks like facebook chat and has many features (check features list). The part of this MOD is also User status with function similar to facebook status. This MOD has also next features like New posts on index etc. (check features list).
header.author-notes:
Chat Features: - online list with avatars and indicator of status of user/friends (online or away) 100% - chat is similar to facebook chat 100% - possibility to collapse chat 100% - chating with offline users (message will be read when user log in) 100% - play a sound when a message arrives 100%
Bottom bar: - online list with avatars and indicator of status of user/friends (online or away) 100% - user status like facebook status (max 512 chars, displayed on view profile and view topic) 100% - login / logout box 100% - google and board search box 100% - last x posts box 100% - private messages box 100%
Friend list: - buttons Add friend and Remove friend in viewtopic.php v. 0.4.x - friend list in your profile v. 0.4.x - approval system for friends (you can accept or decline others who want to became your friend) v. 0.4.x - option to chat only with friends (set in ACP) v. 0.5.0
ACP features: - enable/disable chat v. 0.5.0 - chat only with online users v. 0.5.0 - permissions which users/groups can chat v. 0.5.0 - permissions which users/groups can have user status v. 0.5.0 - set that only friends will be shown in online list for chat v. 0.5.0 - prune all messages v. 0.5.0 - enable/disable google search box v. 0.5.0 - enable/disable login box v. 0.5.0 - enable/disable private messages box v. 0.5.0 - enable/disable Last x posts box v. 0.5.0 - enable/disable user statuses v. 0.5.0 - enable/disable displaying statuses on viewtopic v. 0.5.0 - something like version checker to be informed about new version of this MOD v. 0.5.0 - amount of new posts v. 0.5.0
UCP features: - disable chat and hide for all in online list v. 0.6.0 - only friends can contact me v. 0.6.0 - in online list hide for all users v. 0.6.0 - only friends can see your status v. 0.6.0 - foes cant see your status v. 0.6.0

changelog.change: added Google and board search box
added User status (users can have their personal statuses displayed in profile and viewtopic)
replace "chat" words with the "im" because of compatibility with other chat modifications

chat rebuild from username to user id, allows to chat usernames with space
